    • 方法详细资料

      • intToByteArray

        public static byte[] intToByteArray(int value,
                                    int len)
        Convert int to byte array.
        参数:
        value - - int to be converted
        len - - length of required byte array
        返回:
        Byte array representation of input value
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if not length 2 or 4 or outside range of a short int.

      • byteArrayToInt

        public static int byteArrayToInt(byte[] b)
        Convert byte array to int.
        参数:
        b - - Byte array to be converted
        返回:
        Integer value of input byte array
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ba is null or not length 2 or 4
